body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our support team. My name is Christopher Miller and I work for AutoData Solutions. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Christopher, my name is Mary Allen.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Mary! How can I assist you today? I see you have a data management issue.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm feeling confused about handling the large amount of data at the dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Mary. To better assist you, can you please provide me with the total number of entries you are dealing with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, we currently have two thousand entries to manage.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Mary. Could you also share the exact number of categories you are using for data classification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, we have fifteen separate categories for data classification.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, that helps me understand the scope of the issue. Thank you for sharing that information, Mary. I will now look into possible solutions to streamline your data management process. If you have any more details to add, please feel free to let me know.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help, Christopher. I appreciate your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Mary. If you have any further questions in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
